alert.note: Alert for Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kaufman County through 330 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kemp, or 10 miles northwest of Gun Barrel City, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Seagoville, Kaufman, Mabank, Crandall, Combine, Kemp, Grays Prairie, Cottonwood, Oak Grove and Rosser. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
